title: Marcus Morris Sr.'s Net Worth in 2025: Ex-Knicks Star’s NBA Salary and Contract - EssentiallySports
snippet: As of July 2025, Marcus Morris Sr. is an unsigned free agent. His most recent NBA contracts were a 10-day deal and a rest-of-season contract with the Cleveland Cavaliers during the 2023-24 season.
